remarks: Zero times a vector is the zero vector.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Nov-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nv0.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nv0.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nv0.6 $e |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) $.
nv0 $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( 0 S A ) = Z ) $.
